samuluwa shri lankawe pawathwima pilibandawa thama pakshaye kisidu wiruddhathwayak nathi bawa awadharanaya kala ohu, kese namuth samuluwata muwawi sukhopabhogi wahana genwima athulu jathika dhanaya wiyadam karamin nasthiya “barapathala prashnayak” bawada sandahan kaleya.me athara sapthambaraye pawathwimata niyamitha uthure palath sabha chandayata “biyen” eya kal dama ganima pinisa aanduwa wimal wirawansha wani amathiwarun yodagena “balalun lawa kos ata bawamin” sitina bawada thissa aththanayaka mahatha kiya sitiyeya.uthuru palath sabha mathiwaranaya rata bedime uthsahaya piyawara lesin handunwadena wirawansha amathyawaraya ema chandaya pawathwimata pera palath sabhawalin polis balathala iwath kala yuthu bawa pawasayi.
ee nisa rajayata nathi wu mudal aya kara ganima gana kalabala wiya yuthu naha kiyala.
me usawiya pihituwala thiyenne ekak nadu ikman karanna.

senewirathna mahatha pawasayi.mewara dayata kirulata aluthin idiwana kilomitar 60 k dura nochchiyagama, sinharagama, nikawawa, oyamaduwa, thanthirimale, settikulama nawa margaya anuwa me yapanaya keti margaya idiwe.ee anuwa kolambaa – puththalama nochchiyagama nikawawa oyamaduwa thanthirimale settikulama mannarama punarin haraha yapanayata idiwana mema nawa margaya osse ee 9 margayata wada keti durakin gaman kala haki bawa senewirathna mahatha pawasiya.mita amatharawa padeniya sita anuradhapuraya dakwa kilomitar 80 k diga mitar 10 k palala margaya rupiyal miliyana 6800 ka wiyadamin dan idiwemin thibe.

anthar samaja dayalog lig palamu kotase ragar tharagawaliye aparajitha hawloks krida samajaya ha apkantri layans kandayama athara hawloks pitiye pawathi rathri tharagaya lakunu 36-25kin jaya ganimata hawloks kandayama samathwiya.me jayagrahanayath samaga hawloks pila thawaduratath siya aparajithabhawaya raka gaththeya.hawloks pila me wanawita tharaga 6kata sahabhagi wi ee siyalu tharaga jaya ganimata samathwa sitiyi.tharagaye palamu bhagaya nimawanawita lakunu 19-8kin peramuna gath hawloks pila tharagaya pura gol 4k, uthsahaka dinumak ha drop golayak wartha kala athara apkantri layans kandayama gol 2k, uthsahaka dinumak ha danduwam pahara 2k magin siya lakunu sankhyawa sampurna kaleya.guwan hamudawata jayame athara si.ech.kandayamata erehiwa lakunu 27-22ka jayak athkara gath guwan hamuda pila mewara tharagawaliye siya palamu jayagrahanaya wartha kirimata samathwiya.
